attributes.action: make services available 24/7 for teens with mental health, eating disorders etc
attributes.additional_details: Help make the public more aware of the issues that need addressing to make sure the help is there when ever its needed and remove the stigma around mental health and other disorders so young people dont feel so embarrassed or ashamed, which in turn then helps them ask for the help they need.
attributes.background: Help make the petition more accessible to the public and help make the petition more publicized

rejection.details:
It's not clear if you want the Government to fund a new mental health service for teens, or do something else, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding for Child and Adolescent Mental Health Services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575532

Increase funding for NHS mental health services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581222

Fund a mental health text messaging service: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568361

You can find out how to access NHS mental health services here: https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/nhs-voluntary-charity-services/nhs-services/how-to-access-mental-health-services/

And if you're concerned about yourself or a loved one, you can find out how you can get help from a mental health charity or organisation here: https://www.nhs.uk/mental-health/nhs-voluntary-charity-services/charity-and-voluntary-services/get-help-from-mental-health-helplines/
